## Events.VarBase.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `VarBase` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(opt_variable?: VariableModel);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_variable | [VariableModel](./blockly.variablemodel.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The variable this event corresponds to. Undefined for a blank event. |
